description:
This bug report is in reference to this comment https://bugs.launchpad.net/cinder/+bug/1046382/comments/2

Volumes can support arbitrary meta-data which can be set on create, but the current api, cinderclient does not expose any means to get/update/delete any individual metadata key.
title: Cannot get/update/delete individual meta-data key for volume
